content: Is there an easy way to see all implemented RFC? I've found out that reading RFC is really good way to learn. I want to read every day an RFC that is already implemented, but I couldn't find an easy way to get a list of the RFCs that should be already on available in the stable release. Is there a list for this?
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?q=is%3Aclosed+is%3Aissue+label%3AC-tracking-issue+ is a good approximation I think
